thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: Cindy Thomas

author: Cindy Thomas
title: Cindy Thomas
text: TrueCar helped me purchase my car by allowing me to know if I was paying more or less for the car I was looking forward to getting. I had no idea. It allowed me to negotiate with dealership and I got a good price. When you buy a Nissan from a dealership that sales Chevrolet and then tell the Nissan salesperson what you bought and how much and they say " You got a good deal, sorry I couldn't do that for you" you have done your job and I wouldn't have been able to do it without TrueCar. Will definitely pass the word around about my TrueCar experience.
